meanings.definition: Extend outward beyond the main structure.
meanings.sent1: The tree branches were jettying out over the fence.
meanings.sent2: The balcony was jettying from the side of the house.
meanings.sent3: The cat was jettying its paw out to reach the toy.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter jettyed out into the quiet room.
meanings.sent5: The sun was jettying its rays through the clouds.

meanings.sent1: The rock was jettying out of the ground.
meanings.sent2: His foot was jettying awkwardly from under the table.
meanings.sent3: The toast was jettying out of the toaster too quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her emotions jettyed out unexpectedly during the conversation.
meanings.sent5: The ship was jettying out into the open sea.

meanings.definition: A projecting part of a building.
meanings.sent1: The architectural design included beautiful jettying on the facade.
meanings.sent2: The old house had intricate jettying along its walls.
meanings.sent3: The jettying on the building looked like tiny balconies for birds.
meanings.sent4: The jettying of the castle seemed to defy gravity.
meanings.sent5: The jettying of the structure added a unique charm to the neighborhood.
